items.text: down the track, gets an inside edge onto pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: flatter outside off, he lets it go through. Might have been the arm ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: drags it a little short and he taps it to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: moved away to give himself room but Shakib slows it up and cramps him for room. Ends up punching to short midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: too full, but doesn't get the timing right and driven gently to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: full ball driven to long-on. That will be drinks
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.preText: Getting into the last stretch and West Indies will want at least 100 runs from these last 16 overs to get to something competitive. Will be a tough job getting that many though
items.text: length ball on leg stump, moving away a tad, played gently back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.text: angling across the batsman, who has a poke at it and misses. That went with the angle, wasn't the off-cutter
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.text: good reply from the batsman too full and angled too far across, which allows him to free his arms and drive powerfully to the long-off fence
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: better length, on leg stump and denying him room. Tucked to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.text: back of a length but strays on the pads, which lets Powell tuck him to fine leg for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, stays in his crease and punches this to deep point.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, 1 run

items.preText: Alif: "Is it a bowling pitch? How much dew will come to play at late night? " - not sure about dew, but the pitch has had variable bounce. That said, West Indies have not really managed to get hold of the bowling
items.text: arm ball going with the angle, keeping low, cut away from close to the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: almost through him goes with the arm, he tried to punch forcefully, ends up getting an inside edge that bounces off thigh pad and to the keeper
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, digs it out to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: has an airy waft at this outside off and is beaten
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: tries to go big but straight to mid-off Mashrafe is having a good 200th ODI. That wasn't quite there for the drive, but Powell went for it anyway, ends up splicing it straight to Liton Das at the edge of the circle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, OUT

dismissal.text: R Powell c Liton Das b Mashrafe Mortaza 14 (25b 1x4 0x6) SR: 56.00

items.preText: Nayeem: "I still remember that incident of Samuels getting Steve Waugh's red handkarchief in a test match that Steve gave him after his onslaught. How old is he!!!" - He's going to be 38 in February. Certainly been around a while
items.text: nipping back in off a good length, defended carefully towards point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: inside-edged to fine leg hint of a movement back into the batsman, who went for the big drive. The ball takes a thick inside edge and rolls away to a squarish fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, dabbed to point. they decide against the quick single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: drags it a bit short, still in the channel outside off, but the length allows the batsman to stand tall and punch to deep cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: slowe ball, fuller outside off, driven to deep extra cover. Didn't quite pick it up, but wasn't going very hard at the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.preText: Mohammad Ferdou: "What a performance from Mash!! May be the last home series for him. Hats of to him."
items.text: back of a length on off, a bit of a low bounce again, punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, no run
